itunes:title: Proverbs & Ecclesiastes • Part 1: Dr. Lincoln Blumell
title: Proverbs & Ecclesiastes • Part 1: Dr. Lincoln Blumell
description:
Would sage advice from a parent be worth treasuring? Dr. Lincoln Blumell explores the book of Proverbs and the book of Ecclesiastes and the nature of wisdom, grief, and what fearing God means for modern and ancient readers.

Please rate and review the podcast!

Show Notes (English, French, Spanish, Portuguese): https://followhim.co/old-testament/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/followhimpodcast
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/followhimpodcast
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/FollowHimOfficialChannel
